original_text: And the families of the children of Kohath, the Levites which remained of the children of Kohath, even they had the cities of their lot out of the tribe of Ephraim.
korean_text: 레위 사람인 그핫 자손 중에 남은 자들의 가족들 곧 그핫 자손에게는 제비 뽑아 에브라임 지파 중에서 그 성읍들을 주었으니

sentences.original_text: And the families of the children of Kohath
the Levites which remained of the children of Kohath
even they had the cities of their lot
sentences.korean_translation: 그들도 자기들의 분깃으로 받은 성들을 가졌는데

sentences.original_text: out of the tribe of Ephraim
